meta.title: [Pre-Release] The Train of Thoughts
meta.description: An experimental, immersive story for a special person.
meta.author: Thi Van An TRUONG

intro.circleText: The Train of Thoughts is coming

content.p1: The Train of Thoughts is welcoming all passengers, especially that special person.
content.p2: Feel free to take one ticket, and please patiently wait on the platform until the train comes.

prompts.instruction: Click on the blinking hotspot to claim your free ticket!
prompts.love: Do you wanna claim your ticket by giving away an abundance of your love?
prompts.trust: Do you wanna claim your ticket by giving away an abundance of your trust?
prompts.specialCode:
Are you that special passenger that the Train of Thoughts is meant for?

Enter your special code to confirm!

talk.introduction: Hello, this old man here is the one and only Ticket Controller for the Train of Thoughts!
talk.counter: The Train will arrive soon enough, just patiently wait on the platform for a while.
talk.ask-away: If you have any question, ask away! This old man will help ease your thoughts!
